content:
Satellites matter to life on Earth. That makes them a military target

ON FEBRUARY 19th President Donald Trump signed a directive instructing the Department of Defence to create a new "space force" within the air force. America's interests in defending its assets in space are clear. But a new theatre of war is emerging as a result.

Click here to watch

ex: 网络 二月份；二月的名字；二月的单词
n. 卫星；人造卫星；卫星城；卫星国
v. 通过通讯卫星播送[传播]
网络 卫星楼；随体；卫星赛
eg2: a weather/communications satellite
气象╱通信卫星
The interview came live by satellite from Hollywood.
采访是通过卫星从好莱坞现场传来的。
satellite television/TV(= broadcast using a satellite )
卫星电视
a satellite broadcast/channel/picture
卫星广播╱频道╱照片
The moon is a satellite of earth.
月球是地球的卫星。
satellite states
卫星国

wp.compiler directive: 编译指令;编译器指令;编译程序定向;编译制导
wp.directive standard: 指导性标准;指导性技术文件
wp.directive counseling: 指导式咨询;指导式谘商;指示性咨询
wp.Council Directive: 理事会指令;会指令;符合下列说明委员会;通过了电磁兼容指令

eg2: The business directive is for the business to protect itself, so that the business is not accused of impropriety as it executes its business applications.
这个业务指示的目的是保护企业本身，让企业不会由于执行它的业务应用程序而成为被告。
As president, he will learn that he sends out a  and nothing happens.
作为总统，他将知道如果他发出一个指令，但却什么也不会发生。
Those three characters form the opening sequence of JSP directive syntax.
这三个字符形成了 JSP 指令语法的开始序列。

wp.emerge from: 从;曾经一度遭到;摆脱;浮现

eg2: After all, we all have a “Gandhi” inside of us, just waiting to .
毕竟，我们的心中都有一个“甘地”，只是等待着时机展现。
Ultimately, the concept of Object Lifecycle seems to emerge as a unifying concept for Data, Service and Business Processes.
最终，对象生命周期的概念似乎作为数据、服务和业务流程的统一概念浮现出来。
As the next step, whether or not these people have an awakening they  from the state in which they have been with important new information about themselves.
当下一步到来，无论这些人是否醒来了，他们都从这种状态中汲取能量。 他们在这种状态中发现关于他们自身的重要信息。

wp.Digimon Frontier: 数码宝贝最前线;数码暴龙;数码兽最前线;无限地带
wp.customs frontier: 关境;		关税国境;关税边境
wp.production frontier: 生产边界;生产前缘;产前沿
wp.The Frontier: 前线;西境拓梦;新域民众俱乐部;已开发地区的边缘地带

eg2: I know we might have to wait at the .
我知道我们可能必须在边界上等。
But they cannot adopt frontier technology by themselves.
但他们无法靠自己的力量引进前沿技术。
The frontier town boomed when gold was discovered nearby.
当那个边疆城镇附近发现金矿时它迅速而蓬勃发展起来。

ex: vt. 指导；通知；命令；教授
eg2: You could instruct users of your website to type all numbers in US format, but is that really the best answer?
您虽然可以指导您网站的用户输入所有数字时都采取美国格式，但 这真的是最佳答案吗？
If you want to validate your data against a registered schema prior to storage, you need to instruct DB2 to do so.
如果您希望在存储之前针对一个已注册模式验证数据，那么需要对 DB2 发出这些命令。
And who knew that researchers immobilize subjects in a lab, hook them up to a brain scanner, and then instruct them to engage in sexual activity?
谁又会知道，研究人员会把研究对象固定在实验室里，给他们戴上大脑扫描仪，并指导他们进行鱼水之欢？

Title: Space: the next frontier for war?
